div.p: Mean (+SE) methylation at six loci of adult and nestling male and female barn swallows from 58 families. Means for the adult life stage are computed by pooling parents with their offspring considered at the adult (1-year old) stage. S: significant difference according to sex; LS: significant difference according to life stage (adult vs nestling); S × LS: significant effect of the sex by life stage interaction. See also Table 1.
